Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is part of the "Lennox Castle" application. "Lennox Castle" is a very simple, text based adventure game. The player is a user running the game. The player has a knapsack, for carrying items up to a maximum weight. The player is in a room and may have completed certain tasks. The dungeon pass can be obtained by providing all characters with their desired items.
    Version:
    04/12/17
    Author:
    Michael Jacob

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player()
        Create a player with a new knapsack. Initially, the player can not enter the dungeons and has not tidied any items. The room stack position is -1 as the the list of previous rooms is currently empty.
